topics.body:
Seriously what the fuck did Sakura even do to fucking deserve that?!

She's been literally trying to help get you back for the last 1,000 pages and you fucking kill her? Why?

Cuz *CRAWLING IN MY SKIIIIN!!!!!*

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54249526636872077aaf0100#post_54249526636872077aaf0100

"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/542495536368726a877d0000#post_542495536368726a877d0000

Lets fucking Berserk his ass.

"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/542493b063687215c3830100#post_542493b063687215c3830100
It sucks because the first live action scooby doo was written by James gunn. You can constantly see bits and pieces of gunnliness coming through and you can almost hear some executive tapping his foot and saying "mr. gunn, you are aware we're going for a PG rating, correct?"


"@NotYourAverageLurker":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/542494c163687215c3ac0100#post_542494c163687215c3ac0100
*Y THO*

"@Background Pony #84CD":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/542496986368721d225c0000#post_542496986368721d225c0000
Bruh, you ain't even know what James gunn is capable of. His first big writing gig was a movie with incest, murder, at least one decapitation and a giant monster penis. 

And his first big directing gig had tentacle monsters, zombie deer, a woman so full of parasitic worms that she exploded and a dude getting split in half and not even realizing it.
